comments: Professor Dawson should have probably remained an engineer rather than a professor at the Naval Academy. He lacked teaching skills and seemed more interested in telling us about the books and articles he had authored. I would not recommend his class to anyone unless you like being bored and you really don\'t want to learn anything.
